QuestData.Title: Skoldus Hall
QuestData.Description:
<The object before you is emblazoned with runes, written in the language of domination. One of these runes reacts to your presence, lighting up with a bluish-gray light.>
<It beckons you to touch it.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter Skoldus Hall and defeat its warden.

Objectives.Objective: Slay the warden of Skoldus Hall
